subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Preston Mattingly, a first-round pick and son of a former star, was cut by the Yankees on Sunday, a day before another prospect with a baseball lineage, Dante Bichette Jr., flashed his talents.
snippet: Preston Mattingly, a first-round pick and son of a former star, was cut by the Yankees on Sunday, a day before another prospect with a baseball lineage, Dante Bichette Jr., flashed his talents.
